verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, There was <S%G2258><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a steward <S%G3623><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> was accused <S%G1225><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> that <S%G5613><s%> he had wasted <S%G1287><s%> his <S%G846><s%> goods <S%G5224><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G5455><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, How <S%G5101><s%> is it that I hear <S%G191><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>? give <S%G591><s%> an account <S%G3056><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> stewardship <S%G3622><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> thou mayest be <S%G1410><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> longer <S%G2089><s%> steward <S%G3621><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> the steward <S%G3623><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> shall I do <S%G4160><s%>? for <S%G3754><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%> taketh away <S%G851><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> the stewardship <S%G3622><s%>: I cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2480><s%> dig <S%G4626><s%>; to beg <S%G1871><s%> I am ashamed <S%G153><s%>.

I am resolved <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> I am put out <S%G3179><s%> of the stewardship <S%G3622><s%>, they may receive <S%G1209><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> their <S%G846><s%> houses <S%G3624><s%>.

So <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G4341><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of his <S%G1438><s%> lord's <S%G2962><s%> debtors <S%G5533><s%> unto him, and said <S%G3004><s%> unto the first <S%G4413><s%>, How much <S%G4214><s%> owest thou <S%G3784><s%> unto my <S%G3450><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, An hundred <S%G1540><s%> measures <S%G943><s%> of oil <S%G1637><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Take <S%G1209><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> bill <S%G1121><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sit down <S%G2523><s%> quickly <S%G5030><s%>, and write <S%G1125><s%> fifty <S%G4004><s%>. measures: the word Batus in the original containeth nine gallons three quarts

Then <S%G1899><s%> said he <S%G2036><s%> to another <S%G2087><s%>, And <S%G1161><s%> how much <S%G4214><s%> owest <S%G3784><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, An hundred <S%G1540><s%> measures <S%G2884><s%> of wheat <S%G4621><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Take <S%G1209><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> bill <S%G1121><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> fourscore <S%G3589><s%>. measures: the word here interpreted a measure in the original containeth about fourteen bushels and two quarts

And <S%G2532><s%> the lord <S%G2962><s%> commended <S%G1867><s%> the unjust <S%G93><s%> steward <S%G3623><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> he had done <S%G4160><s%> wisely <S%G5430><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> wiser <S%G5429><s%> than <S%G5228><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of light <S%G5457><s%>.

And I <S%G2504><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, Make <S%G4160><s%> to yourselves <S%G1438><s%> friends <S%G5384><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the mammon <S%G3126><s%> of unrighteousness <S%G93><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> ye fail <S%G1587><s%>, they may receive <S%G1209><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> habitations <S%G4633><s%>. mammon: or, riches

He that is faithful <S%G4103><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that which is least <S%G1646><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> much <S%G4183><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he that is unjust <S%G94><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the least <S%G1646><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> unjust <S%G94><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> much <S%G4183><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> ye have <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> been <S%G1096><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the unrighteous <S%G94><s%> mammon <S%G3126><s%>, who <S%G5101><s%> will commit <S%G4100><s%> to your <S%G5213><s%> trust <S%G4100><s%> the true <S%G228><s%> riches? mammon: or, riches

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye have <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> been <S%G1096><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that which is another man's <S%G245><s%>, who <S%G5101><s%> shall give <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that which is your own <S%G5212><s%>?

No <S%G3762><s%> servant <S%G3610><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> masters <S%G2962><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> either <S%G2228><s%> he will hate <S%G3404><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G25><s%> the other <S%G2087><s%>; or else <S%G2228><s%> he will hold <S%G472><s%> to the one <S%G1520><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> despise <S%G2706><s%> the other <S%G2087><s%>. Ye cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mammon <S%G3126><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, who were <S%G5225><s%> covetous <S%G5366><s%>, heard <S%G191><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they derided <S%G1592><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Ye <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> they which justify <S%G1344><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> men <S%G444><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> knoweth <S%G1097><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> that which is highly esteemed <S%G5308><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> men <S%G444><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> abomination <S%G946><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

The law <S%G3551><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> were until <S%G2193><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>: since <S%G575><s%> that time <S%G5119><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is preached <S%G2097><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> every man <S%G3956><s%> presseth <S%G971><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> easier <S%G2123><s%> for heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> to pass <S%G3928><s%>, than <S%G2228><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> tittle <S%G2762><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> to fail <S%G4098><s%>.

Whosoever <S%G3956><s%> putteth away <S%G630><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> marrieth <S%G1060><s%> another <S%G2087><s%>, committeth adultery <S%G3431><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> whosoever <S%G3956><s%> marrieth <S%G1060><s%> her that is put away <S%G630><s%> from <S%G575><s%> her husband <S%G435><s%> committeth adultery <S%G3431><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> There was <S%G2258><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, which <S%G2532><s%> was clothed <S%G1737><s%> in purple <S%G4209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fine linen <S%G1040><s%>, and fared <S%G2165><s%> sumptuously <S%G2988><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>:

And <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> beggar <S%G4434><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> was laid <S%G906><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> gate <S%G4440><s%>, full of sores <S%G1669><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> desiring <S%G1937><s%> to be fed <S%G5526><s%> with <S%G575><s%> the crumbs <S%G5589><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the rich man's <S%G4145><s%> table <S%G5132><s%>: moreover <S%G235><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the dogs <S%G2965><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and licked <S%G621><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sores <S%G1668><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, that the beggar <S%G4434><s%> died <S%G599><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was carried <S%G667><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Abraham's <S%G11><s%> bosom <S%G2859><s%>: the rich man <S%G4145><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2532><s%> died <S%G599><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was buried <S%G2290><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> hell <S%G86><s%> he lift up <S%G1869><s%> his <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%>, being <S%G5225><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> torments <S%G931><s%>, and seeth <S%G3708><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> afar <S%G3113><s%> off <S%G575><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bosom <S%G2859><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846><s%> he cried <S%G5455><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%>, have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me <S%G3165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> send <S%G3992><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he may dip <S%G911><s%> the tip <S%G206><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> finger <S%G1147><s%> in water <S%G5204><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cool <S%G2711><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> I am tormented <S%G3600><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> flame <S%G5395><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Son <S%G5043><s%>, remember <S%G3415><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> lifetime <S%G2222><s%> receivedst <S%G618><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> good things <S%G18><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> likewise <S%G3668><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> evil things <S%G2556><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> <S%G3592><s%> he is comforted <S%G3870><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> art tormented <S%G3600><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> beside <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> this <S%G5125><s%>, between <S%G3342><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> there is <S%G4741><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> gulf <S%G5490><s%> fixed <S%G4741><s%>: so that <S%G3704><s%> they which would <S%G2309><s%> pass <S%G1224><s%> from hence <S%G1782><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> cannot <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1410><s%>; neither <S%G3366><s%> can they pass <S%G1276><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, that would come from thence <S%G1564><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, I pray <S%G2065><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, father <S%G3962><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> thou wouldest send <S%G3992><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> father's <S%G3962><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>:

For <S%G1063><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>; that <S%G3704><s%> he may testify <S%G1263><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, lest <S%G3363><s%> they <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> of torment <S%G931><s%>.
Abraham <S%G11><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, They have <S%G2192><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>; let them hear <S%G191><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, Nay <S%G3780><s%>, father <S%G3962><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, they will repent <S%G3340><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> they hear <S%G191><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> will they be persuaded <S%G3982><s%>, though <S%G1437><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> rose <S%G450><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>.
